original_text: The trees that had lived in the great tree's shade also fell and went into their graves. Those are the nations that had helped the great tree to fight its battles. They went to join other soldiers who had died in war.
korean_text: 그러나 그들도 그와 함께 스올에 내려 칼에 죽임을 당한 자에게 이르렀나니 그들은 옛적에 그의 팔이 된 자요 나라들 가운데에서 그 그늘 아래에 거주하던 자니라

sentences.original_text: The trees that had lived in the great tree's shade
sentences.korean_translation: 그 큰 나무의 그늘에서 살았던 나무들도

sentences.original_text: also fell and went into their graves
that had helped the great tree to fight its battles
sentences.korean_translation: 그 큰 나무가 싸우는 것을 도왔던

sentences.original_text: They went to join other soldiers
